name: Ritual RPG (Unscored)
description:
Newgrounds web player: 

https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/709497?updated=1523413102

Text based choose your own adventure with a tale about a cult performing a ritual! 

Remake of a text based game I created in 2015. 

Finally... I finished recreating what existed in the original for the 99% part. 

I don't have any music in the game. If you'd like to write some music for me,

comment below or e-mail me at alecguarino97@gmail.com. I'm interested in 5 songs (leitmotif themes):

1. Good God Theme

2. Bad God Theme (Can be reverse, transposed of Good God Theme)

3. Knights Theme (For the guards of the castle) 

4. Mystery theme (For the strange occurrences that happen. Can be a stinger.)

5. Cult theme. (Can be a variant of the Bad God Theme. (Maybe just strip some tracks to make it less epic.)
